ExploreFact.Text: The trinary component of the Stellar Siblings. It's covered in craters that seem to be <color=orange>miniature</color> representations of the vegetation in the Outer Wilds.
Basil saw me and Ping enter the star cluster.
The Nomai concidered adding safeguards to the SSPU in hopes of preventing alien life or other Nomai clans from accessing the SSPU.
Sometime through the loop, the star in Sunset Sister collapses into a white dwarf. Basil wanted to use this to recover Dahlia's lost scroll.
I found a key for what seems to be morse code in a crack in the Brittle Hollow crater on Familiar Refuse.
